cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 58 keyboard shortcuts found in GitLab

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Show or hide the shortcut reference sheet

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your projects page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your groups page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your activity page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your milestones page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your snippets page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Put the cursor in the issues or merge requests search

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your issues page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Go to your merge requests page

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Show or hide the performance bar

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Edit your last comment, you must be in a blank text field below a thread

cards.title: Global
cards.back: Toggle markdown preview when editing text in a text field

cards.title: Project
cards.back: Go to the project home page

cards.back: Go to the project activity feed

cards.title: Project
cards.back: Go to the project releases list

cards.title: Project
cards.back: Go to the project files list

cards.back: Go to the project commits list

cards.back: Go to the repository graph page

cards.back: Go to the project metrics

cards.back: Go to the project environments

cards.back: Change label

cards.back: Start writing a comment, if any text is selected it will be quoted

cards.back: Move to next unresolved discussion, merge requests only

cards.back: Move to previous unresolved discussion, merge requests only

cards.back: Move selection down

cards.back: Open selection

cards.back: Go to file permalink, only while viewing a file

cards.back: Commit, when editing the commit message
